formatted_address: 70 Compassvale Bow, #01-21 Sengkang Grand Mall, Singapore 544692
name: MiX Store @ Sengkang Grand Mall

reviews.text:
I'm new to their store. Today went to get all the Sanrio soda drink.. is was so adorable and I like it. And their cartoon ice cream looks very cute too. But unfortunately I didn't bought them I scared it will melt on my way home.

And I didn't know it was a small outlet. But from the outside looks big. üòÖüòÖüòÖ

I thought it was a self-service store by seeing the counter until there was one staff there helping to key the payment amount manually for the payment terminal for the cashless transaction.

Variety of products are good, from multiple countries, Korea, China, Japan, Thailand, etc.

The Malay and Chinese lady staff here are very friendly. I love the variety of cute korean products, some even come with a cute souvenir/toy inside the sweets box. They stock hard to find items in Singapore. Great for kids and adults! Very convenient next to Buangkok MRT.
If you're a snack lover, you must come to the MiX store and buy these three things: MiX Choice Noodle, LAYS BBQ flavor, and the different flavours of Ice Cream.

the items in the shop are interesting & i had fun looking around & wanted to get some stuff, however i didn‚Äôt feel like purchasing anything because of how rude the salesperson was. it was a self service checkout machine & i was trying to make payment via paywave, i may have accidentally pressed the wrong payment option & she was so rude about it saying ‚Äúwhat u press, must press this one‚Äù with a really bad attitude. i hope the management can look into this & hire staffs that are willing to work in a customer service oriented environment.

vicinity: 70 Compassvale Bow, #01-21 Sengkang Grand Mall, Singapore
